column1: 17248,Marvel Comics Presents (2007) #3,3,23435,102,"The premiere comics anthology gets invaded-by Magneto! Witness a tale of the beginnings of the Brotherhood of Evil Mutants with Quicksilver & Scarlet Witch guest-starring.  Meanwhile, Hellcat continues battling for her very survival, Weapon Omega faces down demons both internal and external, and a routine murder investigation has lead to something-or someone-called...the Vanguard! ,2007,11
